pageContext.claim: “Wrong, never even discussed this with Kellyanne Conway or Steve Mnuchin. Just more Fake News!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an odd denial and warrants skepticism. Bloomberg News reported that President Trump had been "privately testing the idea of replacing his chief of staff, Mick Mulvaney with Treasury Secretary Mnuchin or Kellyanne Conway," not that he had gone so far as to discuss that idea with Conway or Mnuchin.
